channel.title: Error Writing Character File
channel.description:
I get this error every time i log out. This is exactly what i did: Loged on Made my health 99/99 Loged off loged back on see my health at 10/99 Then i C&P this error:
[code]Starting server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:2096 LoginPacket size: 74, RSA packet size: 34 Client type: low memory version dataFileVersion[0]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[1]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[2]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[3]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[4]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[5]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[6]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[7]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[8]: 0x0 UserId: 27426527 Ident: Jeremy:9227 inStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x4f1a5d6 inStreamSessionKey[1]: 0x20bf0c8 inStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x4664eca inStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x28e1542 outStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x4f1a608 outStreamSessionKey[1]: 0x20bf0fa outStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x4664efc outStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x28e1574 [client-1-Jeremy]: Loading finished. BlakeScape Server: Exception! java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: socket write error at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite(SocketOutputStream.java:92) at java.net.SocketOutputStream.write(SocketOutputStream.java:136) at client.parseOutgoingPackets(client.java:87) at client.packetProcess(client.java:17665) at client.packetSending(client.java:17657) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:200) at server.main(server.java:51) Game saved for player Jeremy ClientHandler: Client Jeremy disconnected.[/code]
It has been mest up ever sense i followed the removing thread per client tut. I have compared the code that i had before hand and what i replaced it with and i found no explanation as to why this is happening. I REALLY need someone to help me with this.

item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

you might not be completly logged out when you try getting back so you get the logging in error?

Read full topic

item.title: Error Writing Character File
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

I get this error every time i log out. This is exactly what i did:
Loged on
Made my health 99/99
Loged off
loged back on
see my health at 10/99
Then i C&P this error:

Starting server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:2096 LoginPacket size: 74, RSA packet size: 34 Client type: low memory version dataFileVersion[0]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[1]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[2]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[3]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[4]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[5]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[6]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[7]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[8]: 0x0 UserId: 27426527 Ident: Jeremy:9227 inStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x4f1a5d6 inStreamSessionKey[1]: 0x20bf0c8 inStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x4664eca inStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x28e1542 outStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x4f1a608 outStreamSessionKey[1]: 0x20bf0fa outStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x4664efc outStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x28e1574 [client-1-Jeremy]: Loading finished. BlakeScape Server: Exception! java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: socket write error at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite(SocketOutputStream.java:92) at java.net.SocketOutputStream.write(SocketOutputStream.java:136) at client.parseOutgoingPackets(client.java:87) at client.packetProcess(client.java:17665) at client.packetSending(client.java:17657) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:200) at server.main(server.java:51) Game saved for player Jeremy ClientHandler: Client Jeremy disconnected.

It has been mest up ever sense i followed the removing thread per client tut. I have compared the code that i had before hand and what i replaced it with and i found no explanation as to why this is happening. I REALLY need someone to help me with this.

Read full topic
